programme.title: The Locksmith
programme.desc: Hao Ren inherits the skills of Locksmith Shan and befriends Detective Liu who often seeks his help. When Hao Ren unveils the mystery of Shan's wife's disappearance one day, strange events ensue.

programme.title: Stand Up Story
programme.desc: Mancer cares for his intellectually challenged father Wah. When Mancer finds solace in stand-up comedy, he turns his life's hardships into comedic gold, from school ridicule to pandemic woes.

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: Underground boxer Lin Feng is pursued after refusing to fight for a Bangkok mob boss in illegal matches. He successfully escapes and begins a new life but his past refuses to remain in the past.

programme.title: Back Home
programme.desc: Wing, who can see ghosts since young, discovers that the visions that once haunted him have become worse in his home. Caught between the living and dead, Wing must bring the truth to light to be free.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon

programme.title: The Wig

programme.title: The Grandmaster

programme.title: My Country, My Parents

programme.title: Blind War

programme.title: Look Up

programme.title: July Rhapsody

programme.title: Endless Battle

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques

programme.title: Inexternal

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
